text: Open WebUI is a self-hosted web interface for LLMs. It can connect to tools and run locally.
Tailscale provides a VPN mesh network. Tailscale Serve can expose a localhost service via HTTPS inside the tailnet.
Qdrant is a vector database for similarity search. It stores embeddings and supports filtering.
Embeddings map text to vectors. Retrieval quality can be measured with Recall@K, MRR, and nDCG.
MRL prefix slicing truncates the embedding vector to a target dimension by taking the first dimensions.
